name: unload-tabs
title: UnloadTabs
description: Unload your tabs to free resources
author: Niklas Gollenstede

preferences.name: tabStyle
preferences.title: Unloaded Tab style
preferences.description: A set of css rules to apply to unloaded tabs. Default: 'opacity: .5;'

preferences.name: hotkeyNextLoaded
preferences.title: Next loaded tab
preferences.description: A hotkey combination to jump to the next visible loaded tab right of the currently selected tab (requires Add-On disable/enable to apply). Default: 'control-alt-pageup'.

preferences.name: hotkeyPrevLoaded
preferences.title: Previous loaded tab
preferences.description: A hotkey combination to jump to the previous visible loaded tab left of the currently selected tab (requires Add-On disable/enable to apply). Default: 'control-alt-pagedown'.
